paper_abstract: Let P = {1, 2, . . . , n} be a set of elements called participants. In this paper we construct a visual cryptography scheme (VCS) for the strong access structure specified by the set Gamma(0) of all minimal qualified sets, where Gamma(0) = {S : S subset of P, 1 is an element of S and vertical bar S vertical bar = k}. Any VCS for this strong access structure is called a (k, n)*-VCS. We also obtain bounds for the optimal pixel expansion and optimal relative contrast for a (k, n)*-VCS.
